autoRepayFromBalance(uint256).details: User must first redeem shares from market, then can use this to auto-repay

params._repayAmount: Amount of MUSD to use for debt repayment (0 = repay all debt, or balance if debt is higher)

returns.remaining: Amount of MUSD remaining after repayment

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._repayAmount: Amount of MUSD to use for debt repayment (0 = use all available)

returns.remaining: Amount of MUSD remaining after repayment

params._enabled: True to enable auto-repay, false to disable

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

autoRepayFromBalance(uint256).notice: Redeem market winnings and optionally repay Mezo debt

repayDebtFromBalance(uint256).notice: Helper function to repay debt from MUSD balance
